name: .FPPX File Extension
summary: Learn about .FPPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Native image format of Fresh Paint, a Microsoft app used to created digital oil paint artwork; stores a painting made up of paint brush, pencil, and pen strokes.

content: Fresh Paint allows you to save your paintings in the FPPX format, as well as the JPEG and PNG formats. Fresh Paint also allows you to import the FPPX format.
The location of FPPX files depends on where the user chose to save it. However, the default location for saving FPPX files is the following directory:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
